name: The Modal Nodes' Ommni Box
Lore: 'Difficult-to-play instrument which enhances music. Tech Mo''r plays one for Figrin D''an and the Modal Nodes in the Mos Eisley Cantina.',
Text: 'Deploy on Tech Mo''r or use 2 Force to deploy on your musician (or a site). Your musicians here not carrying this device are Heroic. ''At same site'' on your musicians may be treated as ''at battleground sites.'' ''Cover charges'' only apply to your opponent but are limited to 3.',
